content.rendered: The first Galactic Challenge of the year will take place at Bede’s School on January 14th. After the successful launch of this collaboration between the UK SDC and Bede’s last year, (see link http://www.bedes.org/senior-school/news-and-blogs/senior-school-news/2016/01/prep-schools-galactic-challenge.aspx), we will be hosting several events around the country. Watch this space for details of a Galactic Challenge near you!
